text: Mortal Kombat 2 is an upcoming American science fiction action movie. It is expected to released on October 24, 2025. It was directed by Simon McQuoid and stars Karl Urban, Adeline Rudolph, Jessica McNamee, Josh Lawson, Ludi Lin, Mehcad Brooks, Tati Gabrielle, Lewis Tan, Damon Herriman, Chin Han, Tadanobu Asano, Joe Taslim, and Hiroyuki Sanada. It is the fourth movie in the Mortal Kombat movie series and is also the sequel to the 2021 Mortal Kombat. The movie follows Cole Young as he trains and attempts to get more people to join the side of Earthrealm to fight against Outworld in the Mortal Kombat tournament. Principal photography for the movie started in Gold Coast, Queensland on June 22, 2023 and ended on January 2024. == Cast == ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2025 movies Category:2020s science fiction movies Category:2020s action movies Category:2020s English- language movies Category:American sequel movies Category:IMAX movies Category:Martial arts movies Category:Mortal Kombat movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American action movies Category:Movies based on video games Category:New Line Cinema movies Category:Upcoming movies Category:Upcoming sequel movies Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Mortal Kombat 2 (movie)
